TEXT: CARDINAL . Mr PERSON , who is employed by a local medical and welfare centre ( “ the ORG ” ) in GPE , lives in GPE ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE he instituted proceedings in ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) for judicial review of a decision of ORG ( ORG regionale ) classifying his post in a lower staff category than the one which corresponded to the duties he actually performed , and claimed on that account payment of the difference in remuneration . On DATE he asked for a date to be fixed for the hearing . He subsequently filed CARDINAL applications ( on DATE , DATE and DATE ) for the case to be set down for an urgent hearing .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE the ORG gave judgment against the applicant , who , on a date which has not been specified , appealed to the PERSON . The proceedings are still pending .
